#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
typedef pair<ll,ll> pii;
#define rep(i,N) for(typeof(N) i = 0; i<N; i++)
#define range(i,a,b) for(typeof(b) i = a; i<=b; i++)
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define sz(c) c.size()
map<char,int> mtp;
int main(){
   int tt;
   string stp;
   scanf("%d",&tt);
   while(tt--){
        cin>>stp;
   rep(i,sz(stp)){
       ++mtp[stp[i]];
   }
   map<char,int>::const_iterator it;
   int totPress = 0;
   for(it=mtp.begin();it!=mtp.end();++it){
        int val = (it->first-'a')+1;
        int times = it->second;
        totPress+= val*times;
   }
   cout<<totPress<<endl;
   mtp.clear();
}
   return 0;
}
